OOC: Oh, maybe it was someone else then, maybe JP? One of the moderators
said it to me before, but I can't remember which one.

BIC: Shokaract is finally blasted to the ground by the missiles. He waits
for WarMachine to try something...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2000 5:01 PM
Subject: Re: War


> That's BS, Soulstice. Unitron accused you of many things, but not of
> breaking the giant bot rule.
>
> ::WarMachine::
>
> WarMachine dives to the side, the shot hitting him in the arm (sorry,
> KSL), and blowing it off. He roars, falling to the ground, but firing
> more missiles at Shokaract.
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > OOC: Yikes, a few months ago, when I had a 6 bot gestalt, I was
> accused of
> > moding by Unitron (No offene) for breaking the giant bot rule. Ouch.
> >
> > BIC: Shokaract was covered with a cloud of smoke. The smoke clears.
> > Shokaract is still standing, he looks up at WarMachine, the horns
> on pne
> > side of his head dangling.
> >
> > Shokaract: Uhh, you do not know my power.
> >
> > Shokaract had been charging some negative energy to use through the
> Matrix
> > of Conquest, and he decided now was the time to use it. It had the
> power to
> > make one large blast be the power of 10 Large blasts, but he could
> only use
> > one before having to recharge. Shokaract pulls the energy into his
> hands,
> > making him glow and making rocks around him melt as they were
> caught in it.
> > He fired the single blast, it moved very quickly towards WarMachine,
> > Shokaract intending them to split apart again...
>
>
>
>
>
